# Obtaining data

We will be using the following anndata-compatible data file:  
[DY1_D0_stereo-seq.h5ad](https://filesender.aarnet.edu.au/download.php?token=1beae7a9-436e-4915-9e01-4f24360140aa&files_ids=23496582)

The above link is only temporarily available, but a longer term link is available [here]( https://ftp.cngb.org/pub/SciRAID/stomics/STDS0000059/Stereo-seq/DY1_D0_stereo-seq.h5ad).

This data is from [LISTA: LIver Spatio-Temporal Atlas](https://db.cngb.org/stomics/lista/).
